risks of rabies outbreaks and

and Rural Development  shows that the whole country
has over 7.6 million dogs, most of which are
raised freely. The vaccination rate in 2023 only

reached 30 minutes. Since the beginning of the year,
27 thousand cases of rabies and  deaths increased by 170 minutes
compared to the same period last year, although the regulations are

vaccinated, but when I directly
inspected a series of provinces, the majority
Dogs are not kept in captivity for more than 90 minutes, even

Health also said that 100 deaths were
due to not getting vaccinated against rabies
late or not as
prescribed.  If you don't vaccinate against rabies, the
suicide rate is almost 100. There are up to
43 minutes. People are subjective in not
getting vaccinated after being bitten by a dog or cat.
Many people are still afraid to get vaccinated.
There are many side effects and the
relatively high price of rabies vaccine makes it
difficult to pay. On the
afternoon of March 27, the authorities of
Bien Hoa City coordinated with the
People's Committee of Trang Dai ward to organize the launch of the
Release Dog Catching Team.  Rong This is the
first locality in Dong Nai province to

rabies epidemic, in which team members are
trained to guide the process of Catching dogs with
three full rabies vaccinations.  one

four dog catching rackets, three
dog cages and instructions on classifying healthy dogs and
sick dogs. After capturing the pet, the pet owner will
have to make a commitment not to let the dog run
free.  At the same time, there is an administrative fine
of 400,000 VND per dog for food
and care for newly returned dogs
when caught. For dogs that have not been vaccinated against
rabies, owners must pay for vaccination and
pay an additional fine of 1,000 VND.  5 million VND
to receive a dog. If
this pet is not transferred to schools for

pilot catching free-roaming dogs in Phuong Trang
Dai, Bien Hoa city for 3 months and then
Bach Mai Hospital has just saved the life of a female
university student whose heart was broken in a
traffic accident. The emergency patient was in a coma and stopped breathing
slowly, causing this female student to
immediately fall into danger.  I was in a medical emergency and was
transferred to Thuong Tin hospital
after intubation and ventilation. I was
urgently transferred to Bach Mai hospital in a
state of respiratory arrest. Hoang just
distance me 2 m more and I will be
home.  Yes, I was riding a
motorbike and was hit by a car. Then I was
thrown and hit Chan Tau wall. Did the
patient have a heart attack? About 1.5 kg of
blood clots and fluid were removed. Can I have surgery?
Urgently conducted with 10 liters of blood being
continuously transfused. The most important thing is the
teamwork and coordination between the
system of specialties in the hospital
together. After three weeks of intensive treatment, the
patient was completely cured.  conscious with no neurological
sequelae, hospital leaders
said that in addition to coordination,
first aid is very
important to save the patient's life

An Phu is a border district at the
headwaters of the Hau River in An Giang province.
Recently, the district has promoted the conversion of
ineffective rice cultivation land to
acacia mango cultivation and has promoted effectiveness,
contributing to the overall growth of the district.
Acacia mangoes have been identified by An Phu district as the
district's key product group with
high economic value and are oriented towards
strong transformation over time. The mango area
of ​​An Phu district produced according to
export standards has reached over 600 hectares.
including two production areas according to
Global Gap standards in Khanh An and Phu Huu communes with
an area of ​​354 hectares, granted 61 growing area codes
and exported to
New Zealand, US, Korea, Japan,
Australia, and
China markets in the section.

special afternoon of March 27 a

at least five years ago  person was killed and 50

accident occurred near the city of Lepic on the

operated by fb departed from
Berlin and was on the way to Sir Capricorn
when he suddenly lost control of the car, went off the

Rescue and medics quickly arrived
at Hien Truong. The highway was closed in

local authorities and
rescue services to quickly clarify the cause of the
accident. Thuy Dien is investing  into a

Swedish environment agency. By 2022,
only 35 minutes of plastic waste will be recycled in the
country.  This compares to an average of 40 PH in the
European Union
operating from the end of 2023 at motala
stockholm 200 km southwest
this fully automated facility can process
200,000 tons of waste per year and can
separate 12  types of plastic compared to four types in
conventional factories. According to mathias
philipson, the head of the facility said that
previously more than 50 minutes of plastic was burned because it
could not be classified. Now this number is
less than 5 minutes. Swedish environmental agency
Dien said burning
plastic waste contributes about 7% to greenhouse gas emissions

This year's Easter is approaching and
beautifully decorated eggs

Croatian city of Copernica are having

These are giant easter eggs,

artists said they have painted
more than 120 so far.
Our process will depend on  Depending
on the composition we meticulously blend everything

with four parts. It usually takes us

Decorated with

Some eggs in
